0.text: Innate: Kha'Zix gains Unseen Threat whenever the enemy loses  sight of him or he activates  Void Assault. Unseen Threat: Kha'Zix's next basic attack against an enemy champion deals 14 − 116 (based on level) (+ 40% bonus AD) bonus magic damage and  slows them by 25% for 2 seconds.

Passive: Kha'Zix considers any enemy unit to be Isolated if they are not nearby to one of their allies.  Taste Their Fear,  Evolved Reaper Claws, and  Evolved Spike Racks have special interactions against Isolated targets.

1.text: Active: Kha'Zix slashes the target enemy, dealing physical damage, increased by 110% against Isolated targets.

0.text: Passive: Kha'Zix gains  50 bonus range on his basic attacks and Taste Their Fear. Evolved Bonus: If the target is Isolated, the cooldown is  reduced by 45%.
Active: Kha'Zix fires a bolt of spikes in the target direction that explodes upon hitting an enemy, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies.

1.text: Kha'Zix  heals himself if he is within the explosion.

0.text: Evolved Bonus: Void Spike now fires three clusters in a cone,  slows by 60% and  reveals enemy champions hit for 2 seconds. Multiple explosions do not deal extra damage to the same target nor provide Kha'Zix with additional healing.

1.text: Isolated targets hit by Evolved Spike Racks are  slowed by 90% instead.

0.text: Active: Kha'Zix  leaps to the target location, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies upon landing.

1.text: Taste Their Fear can be cast during the dash. Leap will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

0.text: Evolved Bonus: Leap gains 200 bonus cast range, and the cooldown  resets upon scoring a champion  takedown.

Passive: Each rank in Void Assault allows Kha'Zix to evolve one of his abilities, granting it additional effects. Choosing an ability initiates a 2 second cast time, during which Kha'Zix advances his form, receiving the evolution once it completes.

1.text: Kha'Zix cannot evolve while he is unable to cast abilities.

2.text: Active: Kha'Zix becomes  invisible for 1.25 seconds, during which he gains  40% bonus movement speed.

3.text: After 2 seconds of leaving  invisibility, and for the next 10 seconds, Void Assault can be recast at no additional cost.

4.text: Recast: Kha'Zix mimics the first cast's effects.

0.text: Evolved Bonus: The  invisibility now lasts 2 seconds, and Void Assault can be recast twice.

Passive

Unique: Reduces incoming damage from all basic attacks by 12% (excluding turret attacks).
passive.originText: UNIQUE: Reduces incoming damage from all basic attacks by 12% (excluding turret attacks).

Keywords

consume.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).
consume.originText: UNIQUE – TRINKET: Consume a charge to place an invisible  Totem Ward at the target location, which grants  sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

tags.originHTML:
Keywords

  • totem
  • trinket

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+7% omnivamp against monsters

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Sear: Damaging monsters burns them for 60 (+ 30% AP) (+ 5% bonus AD) (+ 2% bonus health) magic damage over 5 seconds. Omnivamp against monsters provided by this item is not reduced by area of effect damage.
Unique – Challenging Path: Using Smite 5 times consumes this item to upgrade your Smite into Challenging Smite, doubling its damage, and grants all of this item's effects permanently after a 2.5-second delay.
Unique – Huntsman: Killing large monsters grants 60 bonus experience. The first large monster killed grants an additional 150 bonus experience, for a total of 210. If you are at least 2 levels below the average level of the game, large monster kills grant 50 bonus experience per level below the average level of all players in the game. If your gold from minions is greater than 40% your gold from monsters, a lane minion will grant 13 less gold and 50% reduced experience. This penalty is removed at 20 minutes.
Unique – Recoup: Regenerate up to 8 − 18 (based on level) mana per second when in the jungle or river, based on missing mana.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SEAR: Damaging monsters burns them for 60 (+ 30% AP) (+ 5% bonus AD) (+ 2% bonus health) magic damage over 5 seconds. Omnivamp against monsters provided by this item is not reduced by area of effect damage.

tags.originHTML:
Keywords

  • jungle

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique: Holds charges that refill upon visiting the shop (2 charges).
passive.originText: UNIQUE: Holds charges that refill upon visiting the shop (2 charges).

consume.originHTML:
Consume

Consumes a charge to regenerate 5.21 health every 0.5 seconds over 12 seconds, restoring a total of 125 health.
consume.originText: Consumes a charge to regenerate 5.21 health every 0.5 seconds over 12 seconds, restoring a total of 125 health.

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+60 attack damage
+20 ability haste
+18 Lethality (11.2 − 18 (based on level) armor penetration)

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Nightstalker: Your next basic attack against an enemy champion deals ( 75 / 55) (+ ( 30% / 25%) bonus AD) bonus physical damage on-hit and slows the target by 99% for 0.25 seconds (15 second cooldown).
Scoring a takedown against an enemy champion within 3 seconds of damaging them resets this effect's cooldown and grants you invisibility for 1.5 seconds.
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5 bonus movement speed, and 5 ability haste.
passive.originText:
UNIQUE – NIGHTSTALKER: Your next basic attack against an enemy champion deals ( 75 /  55) (+ ( 30% /  25%) bonus AD) bonus physical damage on-hit and  slows the target by 99% for 0.25 seconds (15 second cooldown).
Scoring a  takedown against an enemy champion within 3 seconds of damaging them resets this effect's cooldown and grants you  invisibility for 1.5 seconds.

1.originHTML: +  +  900
